name: Ribbit Rampage
description:
Devour the most fearsome of insects. Claw your way to the depths of the back garden. Ribbit and rampage until it is done.

Ribbit Rampage is a 2D arcade shooter where you're a frog. You both move and attack by clicking - and licking - in a gameplay loop which requires ever increasing speed and precision. Manage hoardes of enemies which must all be defeated in different ways. Don't get swarmed - one hit and it's game over. Gain enough points to escalate to higher and higher difficulty levels.

Try to beat my high score - 8017 points on hard mode:

If you do, post what score you got in the comments!

The original version of this game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
